column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Tina - Thanks for your great review. If I could go back in time
column2: we would have leased and built-out a much larger space than what we came up with three years ago. But having been in the restaurant industry more than 25 years
column3: I can say that there is one undeniable truth about this business: There's no such thing as a perfect restaurant.
